questions.question: What is the mean of the following data: 4, 8, 6, 5, 3?

options: Average of the two middle values
Sum of all values divided by the number of values

questions.question: In a box plot, what do the whiskers represent?

options: All sets have the same range

options: All members of a defined group
The mean of a data set
